00033 using namespace pwiz::util;

00036 ostream* os_ = 0;

00039 const char* oboText_ = 
00040     "format-version: 1.0\n"
00041     "date: 01:10:2007 23:46\n"
00042     "saved-by: deutsch\n"
00043     "auto-generated-by: OBO-Edit 1.101\n"
00044     "default-namespace: PSI-MS\n"
00045     "\n"
00046     "[Term]\n"
00047     "id: MS:0000000\n"
00048     "name: MZ controlled vocabularies\n"
00049     "def: \"MZ controlled vocabularies.\" [PSI:MS]\n"
00050     "\n"
00051     "[Term]\n"
00052     "id: MS:1000001\n"
00053     "name: sample number\n"
00054     "def: \"A reference number relevant to the sample under study.\" [PSI:MS]\n"
00055     "relationship: part_of MS:1000548 ! sample attribute\n"
00056     "\n"
00057     "[Term]\n"
00058     "id: MS:1000011\n"
00059     "name: mass resolution\n"
00060     "def: \"The maximum m/z value at which two peaks can be resolved, according to one of the standard measures.\" [PSI:MS]\n"
00061     "is_a: MS:1000503 ! scan attribute\n"
00062     "\n"
00063     "[Term]\n"
00064     "id: MS:1000025\n"
00065     "name: magnetic field strength\n"
00066     "def: \"A property of space that produces a force on a charged particle equal to qv x B where q is the particle charge and v its velocity.\" [PSI:MS]\n"
00067     "related_synonym: \"Magnetic Field\" []\n"
00068     "exact_synonym: \"B\" []\n"
00069     "is_a: MS:1000480 ! mass analyzer attribute\n"
00070     "\n"
00071     "[Term]\n"
00072     "id: MS:1000030\n"
00073     "name: vendor\n"
00074     "def: \"Name of instrument vendor, replaced by MS:1000031 Model From Vendor.\" [PSI:MS]\n"
00075     "is_obsolete: true\n"
00076 ;
00077 
00078 
00079 void test()
00080 {
00081     const string& filename = "obotest_temp.txt";
00082     ofstream temp(filename.c_str());
00083     temp << oboText_ << endl; 
00084     temp.close();
00085 
00086     OBO obo(filename);
00087 
00088     if (os_) *os_ << obo << endl; 
00089    
00090     unit_assert(obo.filename == filename);    
00091     unit_assert(obo.header.size() == 5); 
00092     unit_assert(obo.terms.size() == 4); // no obsolete terms
00093 
00094     const Term* term = &obo.terms[0];
00095     unit_assert(term->prefix == "MS");
00096     unit_assert(term->id == 0);
00097     unit_assert(term->name == "MZ controlled vocabularies");
00098     unit_assert(term->def == "MZ controlled vocabularies.");
00099     unit_assert(term->parentsPartOf.empty());
00100     unit_assert(term->parentsIsA.empty());
00101 
00102     term = &obo.terms[1];
00103     unit_assert(term->id == 1000001);
00104     unit_assert(term->name == "sample number");
00105     unit_assert(term->parentsPartOf.size() == 1);
00106     unit_assert(term->parentsPartOf[0] == 1000548);
00107  
00108     term = &obo.terms[2];
00109     unit_assert(term->id == 1000011);
00110     unit_assert(term->name == "mass resolution");
00111     unit_assert(term->parentsIsA.size() == 1);
00112     unit_assert(term->parentsIsA[0] == 1000503);
00113 
00114     term = &obo.terms[3];
00115     unit_assert(term->id == 1000025);
00116     unit_assert(term->exactSynonyms.size() == 1);
00117     unit_assert(term->exactSynonyms[0] == "B");
00118 
00119     system(("rm " + filename).c_str()); 
00120 }
00121 
00122 
00123 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00124 {
00125     try
00126     {
00127         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00128         test();
00129         return 0;
00130     }
00131     catch (exception& e)
00132     {
00133         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00134     }
00135     catch (...)
00136     {
00137         cerr << "Caught unknown exception.\n";
00138     }
00139 
00140     return 1; 
00141 }
